Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #21 buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are rr via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn & 55th, due to police activity nr 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn, then resume their normal route on 55th, due to police activity near 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to a signal problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#76 Diversey/California

#52 Kedzie/California

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
